user.title: Set up Loca Device Tracker
user.description: Enter your Loca API credentials to connect your devices to Home Assistant.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Loca Account
reauth_confirm.description: The Loca API credentials for {username} need to be updated. Please enter your current credentials.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Loca API. Please check your network connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication credentials. Please verify your API key, username, and password.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

init.title: Loca Options
init.description: Configure options for your Loca integration.

api_authentication_failed.title: API authentication failed
api_authentication_failed.description: The Loca API authentication for {account} has failed. Please check your credentials and reauthenticate.

no_devices_found.title: No devices found
no_devices_found.description: No devices were found for the Loca account {account}. This is normal for new accounts. If you have devices, please ensure they are properly configured and active in your Loca account.
